name: Rogue: Genesia (demo)
description:
Rogue : Genesia

Walk upon a new world and slay foes endangering it.

Rogue : Genesia is a rogue-lite deck building game, where you fight an horde of thousands, slay your path through them to defeat the boss and save one of the many world.

Join the discordfor Update about the game ! What is available now in the demo :
  • 26 passive bonus to obtain en level-Up

  • Collect up to 22 Artifact, each with powerful and special effect
  • 9 weapons to use, and more coming up soon
  • Mutliple paths to choose from
  • Shop
